contest-event.event-date:
April 10, 1909 D Millgate Contest
Millgate Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
millgate-contest
None
Andromeda
Millgate, Whitworth, Lancashire 1st prize £10, 2nd prize £5, 3rd prize £3, 4th prize £2, 5th prize £1 divided between Eccleston and Haslingden Temperance. March contest - 1stWater, 2nd Tottington. Best cornet - Water. Best euphonium - Tottington. Best soprano - Bacup Change 6 bands competed.
April 21, 2012, 9:47 a.m. Oct. 9, 2020, 11:31 a.m.
1 Water Band Rossendale William Pollard
2 Tottington Public Band Bedan Holding
3 Summerseat William Pollard
4 Bacup Change T. Hardacre
5 Haslingden Borough Band J. J. Hargreaves
5 Eccleston Subscription John Partington
